languages.text: {n}Джай заглядывает через плечо оборванца в его потрепанный бланк.{/n} "Ты... пришел просить об умерщвлении, дабы твои органы перешли по наследству внучке? Вряд ли твое изношенное тело, старец..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай заглядывает через плечо оборванца в его потрепанный бланк.{/n} "Ты... пришел просить об умерщвлении, дабы твои органы перешли по наследству внучке? Вряд ли твое изношенное тело, старец..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай заглядывает через плечо оборванца в его потрепанный бланк.{/n} "Ты... пришел просить об умерщвлении, дабы твои органы перешли по наследству внучке? Вряд ли твое изношенное тело, старец..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的目光越过了他的肩膀，看着他手上皱巴巴的表格。{/n}“你……是来请求进行遗体捐赠的吗？这样一来，你的器官就可以作为你的遗产，归你的孙女所有，对吗？但她恐怕不会想要你破破烂烂的身体，老家伙……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的目光越过了他的肩膀，看着他手上皱巴巴的表格。{/n}“你……是来请求进行遗体捐赠的吗？这样一来，你的器官就可以作为你的遗产，归你的孙女所有，对吗？但她恐怕不会想要你破破烂烂的身体，老家伙……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se asoma por encima del hombro del solicitante para leer su formulario arrugado.{/n} «Tú... ¿has venido a solicitar la mortificación para que tu nieta herede tus órganos? No creo que quiera tus entrañas desgastadas, abuelo...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se asoma por encima del hombro del solicitante para leer su formulario arrugado.{/n} «Tú... ¿has venido a solicitar la mortificación para que tu nieta herede tus órganos? No creo que quiera tus entrañas desgastadas, abuelo...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは老人の肩越しにくしゃくしゃの書類をのぞき込む。{/n}「あんたは…壊疽の依頼ね。遺産として臓器を孫娘にやりたいの？孫娘もあんたのぼろぼろで時間切れの近い身体なんか分けてもらいたくはないと思うけれどね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは老人の肩越しにくしゃくしゃの書類をのぞき込む。{/n}「あんたは…壊疽の依頼ね。遺産として臓器を孫娘にやりたいの？孫娘もあんたのぼろぼろで時間切れの近い身体なんか分けてもらいたくはないと思うけれどね…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae regarde par-dessus l'épaule du vieil homme pour lire son formulaire froissé.{/n} « Vous... aspirez à la mortification pour que votre petite-fille hérite de vos organes ? Vu votre état de décrépitude avancée, ce n'est franchement pas un cadeau à lui faire, mon vieux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae regarde par-dessus l'épaule du vieil homme pour lire son formulaire froissé.{/n} « Vous... aspirez à la mortification pour que votre petite-fille hérite de vos organes ? Vu votre état de décrépitude avancée, ce n'est franchement pas un cadeau à lui faire, mon vieux... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae späht dem Mann über die Schulter, um sein zerknittertes Formular zu lesen.{/n} "Ihr ... beantragt eine Tötung, damit Eure Enkelin Eure Organe erbt? Sie wird mit Euren ausgeleierten Körperteilen nicht viel anfangen können, Alterchen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae späht dem Mann über die Schulter, um sein zerknittertes Formular zu lesen.{/n} "Ihr ... beantragt eine Tötung, damit Eure Enkelin Eure Organe erbt? Sie wird mit Euren ausgeleierten Körperteilen nicht viel anfangen können, Alterchen ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini adama diken Jae, adamın buruşturulmuş formunu okuyor.{/n} "Buraya... Organların torununa miras kalsın diye ölüm talebinde bulunmaya mı geldin? Kızın senin eskimiş organlarını isteyeceğini hiç sanmıyorum be ihtiyar..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae peers over the man's shoulder to read his crumpled form.{/n} "You... are here to request mortification, so that your organs go to your granddaughter as an inheritance? She will hardly want your worn-out body parts, old-timer..."
